fr.lirmm.graphik.graal.core.grd

Class DefaultGraphOfRuleDependencies

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lirmm.graphik.graal.core.grd.DefaultGraphOfRuleDependencies
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphOfRuleDependencies

    public class DefaultGraphOfRuleDependencies
extends Object
implements GraphOfRuleDependencies
    The graph of rule dependencies (GRD) is a directed graph built from a rule set as follows: there is a vertex for each rule in the set and there is an edge from a rule R1 to a rule R2 if R1 may lead to trigger R2, i.e., R2 depends on R1. R2 depends on R1 if and only if there is piece-unifier (for this notion, see f.i. this paper (TODO)) between the body of R2 and the head of R1.
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Sipieter (INRIA) <clement@6pi.fr>
    Swan Rocher <swan.rocher@lirmm.fr>
